description: Bring the colours of the festive season to your table with this beautiful white Christmas cake. This striking cheesecake will surely satisfy your guests.
name: No-Bake White Christmas & Cherry Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble, remove cheesecake from pan and place on a platter. Top with dollops of whipped cream, some of the white Christmas, raspberries and cherries. Serve with remaining white Christmas.
